::FireStrike::
FireStrike looked over to his brother with new hatred in his 
eyes. "Leave them be brother. Megatron can handle this himself. ButI 
can see others in the distance on approach. We can get them."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Nightstrike:
> 
> Nightsrike avoided the first attack of Unitron "Do you like that I 
> destroy him, my lord"said the male to Megatron while he prepared 
his 
> weapons
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > The two blasts pounded Megatron's already dented and charred 
chest, 
> but
> > if he was in pain from them, he did not show it. He kept moving 
> forward.
> > "I will show you the meaning of that title." he was now moved 
right 
> in
> > front of Unitron, and reached for the hand with the laser pistol.
